events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly to determine the next steps.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering positions has been assigned to your application and will contact you shortly.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully. Your background in software engineering matches our requirements.
Thank you for the opportunity. I am excited about the Software Engineer role and look forward to the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 10:00 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
The technical interview went well. You demonstrated strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
We have scheduled the HR interview for May 7th at 2:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps.
Your HR interview was completed successfully. The team appreciates your enthusiasm and fit for our company culture.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer position with a competitive salary and benefits package.
I have reviewed the offer and am very happy with the terms. I am excited to join the engineering team.
The candidate has formally accepted the job offer and is looking forward to starting their new role.
The onboarding process has started. Welcome to the company! We will guide you through initial training and setup.
The hiring process is now complete. The new software engineer has successfully joined the team and is fully onboarded.
